ComicInfo.Title: 2011 Special
ComicInfo.Summary:
The 2011 Harvey-nominated Jingle Belle story "Grounded" returns in a special single-issue printing along with six pages of brand new content!
When Jingle Belle and her father Santa are caught in a web of lies, it falls upon Santa's one-time sidekick, the demon Krampus to administer punishment! The sly devil forbids the contentious Kringles from ever leaving the North Pole, thus ending Christmas for all time! Can Jingle find a way around Krampus' punishment and restore the holiday season?
Written by PAUL DINI (Madame Mirage, Batman: Arkham City) and drawn by STEPHANIE GLADDEN (The Powerpuff Girls, Hopsters Tracks) Jingle Belle: Gift Wrapped also features a brand-new cover and all-new stories featuring Jing, Polly Green and the wicked and wacky Krampus himself!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-05 11:10:40. [CVDB307724]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Stephanie Gladden, Tom Feister, Troy Peteri
ComicInfo.Editor: Filip Sablik, Philip W. Smith II
ComicInfo.Characters: Hobbes, Ida Red, Jingle Belle, Krampus, Mrs. Santa Claus, Polly Green, Santa Claus, Tashi Ounce
